name: Assist OS - Ghibli Style Planner
description: Check out our podcast! https://spotifyanchor-web.app.link/e/sd4uA5A1tzbhttps://www.buymeacoffee.com/arliIntroducing our brand new Studio Ghibli-inspired Notion template, designed to help you boost your productivity and creativity like never before.
